resources.string: To add a new habit, click the plus-icon in bottom of the screen. Then you can choose the icon, name and a type for your habit.

To see the details of your habit click and hold the habit. A new screen will open where you will see the details. You can also rename or delete your habit. To rename click the name, write the new name and click "OK"

To get points you have to open the app everyday and check the habit you have been doing/not doing. Doing this gets you points instantly and gives your habits a new multiplier and adds one day to day streak. You will also gain login-streak by simply opening the app.

By getting scores you also gain experience points. You can see your progress in top of the screen. When you get enough points you will unlock a new level. By getting levels you unlock new skins for your character. You can inspect all the unlockable skins in the "Rewards" view.
